creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Margaret McMillan Webber in memory of her mother, Katherine Kittredge McMillan
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: scene from a Shah Namah MS by Firdausi, probably painted in Shiraz of Isfahan; the Khagan sends his brother Tuwurg to pursue Curdiya, sister of Bahram Chubina; Curdiya, clad in her brother's armor, parleys with him before she slays him; Paintings - Album
medium: Ink, colors and gold on paper
title: Curdiya Parleys with Tuwurg
